ComicInfo.Title: The Ugliest Man in the World; General Moulton and the Devil; The Fangs of Fate!; The Plant of Doom; The Devil in Massachusetts; The Cloak of a Corpse; Hades Highway
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Ugliest Man in the World: Actor Ron Carney is challenged to come up with a horrible make-up for his next horror movie. A mysterious stranger introduces him to the sect of "The Ugly Ones" and deforms his face in a cruel way. After having wrapped up the movie successfully, Carney wants to dispose of his ugly face, but is stuck with it.
General Moulton and the Devil: Moulton bargains with Satan to make him a rich man. When he gets too greedy, the devil withdraws the fortune but insists on the general's soul.
The Fangs of Fate!: Dr. Kissack runs a snake farm. When threatened by a neighbor, Kissack kills the man and disposes of the body as snake fodder. His monster python grows ever large on this special diet. Rampaging through town, the beast gets killed and Kissack meets his fate.
The Plant of Doom: Explorer kills his rival and breeds a flesh-eating plant out of his remains.
The Devil in Massachusetts: An odd thunderstorm spares the house of a woman writing a book about witchcraft.
The Cloak of a Corpse: When a man steals a hanged man's robe, the dead comes to visit him and retrieves his cloak.
Hades Highway: Road worker Carter murders his colleague and buries him using a steamroller. He is haunted by a tar-covered black ghost and slowly drifts into insanity. When Carter kills another person, he is finally arrested and regains his peace of mind.
ComicInfo.Penciller: Jack Katz,Ross Andru,Rocco Mastroserio,Mo Marcus,John Celardo,Jack Katz,Ross Andru,Rocco Mastroserio,Mo Marcus,John Celardo
ComicInfo.Inker: Jack Katz,Ross Andru,Rocco Mastroserio,John Celardo,Jack Katz,Ross Andru,Rocco Mastroserio,John Celardo
ComicInfo.Letterer: Herb Field,Ed Hamilton,John Duffy,Herb Field,Ed Hamilton,John Duffy
